entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
